ctx: intros y z Gy Gz x Gx H.
assert (Add (Opp x) (Add x y) = Add (Opp x) (Add x z)) as H1.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite (assoc (Opp x) (Add x y) z) in H1.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

original: intros [intern [assoc [neutral opp]]]. intros y z Gy Gz x Gx H. assert (Add (Opp x) (Add x y) = Add (Opp x) (Add x z)) as H1. - rewrite H. reflexivity. rewrite (assoc (Opp x) (Add x y) z) in H1. rewrite (assoc (Opp x) (Add x z) y) in H1. rewrite (neutral (Opp x) Gy) in H1. rewrite (neutral (Opp x) Gz) in H1. rewrite (opp x Gx) in H1. auto.
